function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulty in maintaining the supply of vital food and medicine due to panic buying and disrupted supply chains.","Impact":"Shortage of essential goods and medicines, leading to increased risk of malnutrition and untreated medical conditions.","Mitigation":"Implement better monitoring of buying behavior, optimize supply chains, and take legal actions against hoarding and anti-social activities.","Technologies":"Smart city technology, IoT","People":"City residents, especially those who rely on essential goods and medicines.","Owner":"Government, city authorities, and supply chain management organizations."},{"Description":"High concentration of people in cities limiting the ability to travel to alternative sources of supply.","Impact":"Vulnerability to supply chain disruptions and shortages of essential goods and services.","Mitigation":"Implement smart city technology to monitor and optimize supply chains, prioritize delivery access, and limit purchasing patterns.","Technologies":"Smart city technology, IoT","People":"City residents, especially those who rely on essential goods and services.","Owner":"City authorities, supply chain management organizations, and technology implementers."},{"Description":"Risk of hospitals reaching capacity and frontline medical personnel facing scarcity of resources and access to necessary items.","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare facilities, shortage of protective gear and medical supplies, and delayed access to essential items for medical personnel.","Mitigation":"Use predictive analytics to track patient numbers and hospital capacity, monitor resource availability, and prioritize access to food and transportation for medical personnel.","Technologies":"Predictive analytics, tracking systems, and smart city technology","People":"Frontline medical personnel, patients, and hospital staff.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, city authorities, and technology implementers."}]}
